cu.explanation_en: Setting DRB integrity to an invalid value will cause security configuration errors and prevent proper data protection.

du.explanation_en: Setting SIB1 TDA to zero will invalidate system information broadcast timing and prevent proper cell access.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SIB1 TDA 設定為零會使系統資訊廣播時序無效，並阻止正確的細胞接入。
